title: Audi
description: Audi, a leading brand in the automotive industry, utilizes a refined palette of colors to represent its identity. The primary colors include white (FFFFFF) symbolizing purity and elegance, black (000000) denoting sophistication, and a striking red (F50537) as a nod to dynamic performance and passion. These hues are prominently featured on Audi's official brand site and detailed in their corporate identity guidelines.
